name: Maya Fey's Borger Eating Simulator
description:
A game I made while experimenting with the GDevelop game engine. Play as Ace Attorney's Maya Fey or one of her alternate skins and collect as many borgers as you can! Play alone or team up with a friend in one of the many game modes!

Maya sprites are from Moe More No Limit Off Beat Action Shooting: 

http://spritedatabase.net/file/10000/Maya_Fey
